titles.title: Uniform Poll Closing Act of 2001
To establish a uniform closing time for the operation of polls on the date of the election of the President and Vice President.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 5/1/2001--Introduced. Uniform Poll Closing Act of 2001 - Establishes 11 p.m. eastern standard time as the uniform closing time for the operation of polls on the day of the presidential election for each State (other than Alaska and Hawaii) and the District of Columbia.
